channel.title: ELI5 on Alisa in Techland
channel.description: Recent content in ELI5 on Alisa in Techland

item.title: ELI5 - Primary Keys
item.description: When I get requests to ingest or extract data as tables or reports, I often ask the requestor for the primary key.

item.title: ELI5 - Clustering
item.description: This Explain Like I’m 5 will be about clustering, a technique used by Snowflake, a cloud based data warehouse, to improve query performance.

item.title: ELI5- Slowly Changing Dimensions
item.description: Explain like I’m 5 (ELI5) comes from the popular concept that if you really know something well, you can explain it simply, so a five year old can understand.

item.title: Database Storage
item.description: There are two types of relational database management systems: columnar and row-based, also called: column-wise and row-wise, column store and row store, column-based and row-based, and column-oriented and row-oriented.
